AT.name: Adventures of Pip™
AT.description: Adventures of Pip revitalizes the classic side-scrolling action platform genre. Pip -- the ultimate digital underdog – is a lowly single pixel in a 32-bit world who proves that you can’t judge a hero by the fidelity of his shaders. During the game, Pip gains the ability to evolve and grow by absorbing pixels from his fallen foes. Those same pixels can then be used to blast through environment puzzles and enemies, devolving Pip back to a single pixel. Players will explore five stylized worlds and experience up to 10 hours of epic adventure saving Pip’s village from the evil Queen DeRezzia. Inspired by classic platformers, Adventures of Pip basks in a world where players can defeat a huge 32-bit boss as a single pixel or even as an 8-bit character. With three different forms, evolve and devolve Pip to solve puzzles and defeat enemies; each with their own weakness and strength that must be unraveled throughout the campaign.

BG.name: Adventures of Pip™
BG.description: Adventures of Pip revitalizes the classic side-scrolling action platform genre. Pip -- the ultimate digital underdog – is a lowly single pixel in a 32-bit world who proves that you can’t judge a hero by the fidelity of his shaders. During the game, Pip gains the ability to evolve and grow by absorbing pixels from his fallen foes. Those same pixels can then be used to blast through environment puzzles and enemies, devolving Pip back to a single pixel. Players will explore five stylized worlds and experience up to 10 hours of epic adventure saving Pip’s village from the evil Queen DeRezzia. Inspired by classic platformers, Adventures of Pip basks in a world where players can defeat a huge 32-bit boss as a single pixel or even as an 8-bit character. With three different forms, evolve and devolve Pip to solve puzzles and defeat enemies; each with their own weakness and strength that must be unraveled throughout the campaign.

BE.name: Adventures of Pip™
BE.description: Adventures of Pip ravive le jeu de plates-formes à défilement horizontal. Pip, le héros virtuel ultime, n'est qu'un simple pixel dans un monde 32 bits où l'on ne doit pas juger un héros par la qualité de son apparence. Au cours du jeu, Pip gagne la capacité d'évoluer grâce aux pixels de ses ennemis. Il peut les utiliser pour résoudre des énigmes et combattre, ou encore reprendre la forme d'un simple pixel. Les joueurs découvriront cinq mondes stylisés et profiteront de jusqu'à 10 heures d'aventures au cours desquelles ils tenteront de sauver le village de Pip des griffes de la Reine DeRezzia. Inspiré par les classiques du genre, Adventures of Pip se déroule dans un monde où le joueur peut vaincre un énorme boss 32 bits avec un simple pixel, ou encore un personnage 8 bits. Faites évoluer Pip sous ses trois différentes formes pour résoudre les énigmes et vaincre vos ennemis, chacun avec ses propres forces et faiblesses, que vous découvrirez lors de votre campagne.

ES.name: Adventures of Pip™
ES.description: Adventures of Pip revitaliza el clásico género de plataforma de acción de desplazamiento lateral. Pip, el desamparado digital definitivo, es un píxel en un mundo de 32-bit, que prueba que no puedes juzgar a un héroe por la fidelidad de sus sombreados. Durante el juego, Pip gana la habilidad de evolucionar y crecer mediante la absorción de los píxeles de sus enemigos caídos. Esos mismos píxeles pueden usarse para destruir acertijos y enemigos del entorno, lo cual devuelve a Pip a un solo píxel. Los jugadores explorarán cinco mundos estilizados y experimentarán hasta 10 horas de aventura salvando a la villa de Pip de la malvada Reina DeRezzia. Inspirado por los clásicos juegos de plataforma, Adventures of Pip se disfruta en un mundo donde los jugadores pueden derrotar a un jefe enorme de 32-bit como un píxel único o incluso como un personaje de 8-bit. Con tres formas distintas, evoluciona e involuciona a Pip para resolver acertijos y derrotar enemigos; cada uno con sus propias fortalezas y debilidades que deben desentrañarse a lo largo de la campaña.

IT.name: Adventures of Pip™
IT.description: Adventures of Pip rivitalizza il classico genere dei giochi platform a scorrimento laterale. Il protagonista del gioco è Pip, un singolo e indifeso pixel in un mondo a 32 bit pronto a dimostrare che un eroe non si giudica dalla sua "grafica". Durante il gioco, Pip otterrà l'abilità di evolvere e crescere assorbendo pixel dai nemici sconfitti. Pip potrà usare quegli stessi pixel anche per risolvere rompicapi ambientali e sconfiggere altri nemici: in tal modo, però, regredirà allo stato di singolo pixel. Esplora cinque mondi dalla grafica stilizzata e vivi fino a 10 ore di epiche avventure nel tentativo di salvare il villaggio di Pip dalla malvagia regina DeRezzia. Adventures of Pip si ispira ai classici del genere platform. Avventurati in un mondo bizzarro e sconfiggi enormi boss a 32 bit come singolo pixel o come personaggio a 8 bit. Fai evolvere Pip in tre forme per risolvere rompicapi e sconfiggere i nemici, ciascuno con le sue forze e debolezze da scoprire nel corso del gioco.

PL.name: Adventures of Pip™

Inspired by classic platformers, Adventures of Pip basks in a world where players can defeat a huge 32-bit boss as a single pixel or even as an 8-bit character. With three different forms, evolve and devolve Pip to solve puzzles and defeat enemies; each with their own weakness and strength that must be unraveled throughout the campaign.

PT.name: Adventures of Pip™
PT.description: Adventures of Pip revitaliza o género clássico de ação em plataformas no estilo "side-scrolling". Pip, o derradeiro ser digital desfavorecido, é um pequeno e solitário píxel num mundo de 32 bits que prova que não podemos julgar um herói pela resolução dos seus shaders. Durante o jogo, Pip ganha a capacidade para evoluir e crescer ao absorver os píxeis dos inimigos derrotados. Estes píxeis podem ser usados para resolver quebra-cabeças e eliminar os inimigos, voltando a transformar Pip num único píxel. Os jogadores irão explorar cinco mundos estilizados ao longo de uma aventura épica com 10 horas para salvar a aldeia de Pip da malvada Rainha DeRezzia. Inspirado nos jogos de plataformas clássicos, Adventures of Pip apresenta um mundo onde os jogadores podem derrotar um enorme boss de 32 bits como um único píxel ou até mesmo como uma personagem de 8 bits. Contando com três formas diferentes, desenvolve e reverte o Pip para resolver quebra-cabeças e derrotar inimigos, cada um tendo os seus próprios pontos fortes e fracos que devem ser desvendados ao longo da aventura.

RU.name: Adventures of Pip™
RU.description: Adventures of Pip возрождает жанр классических экшн-игр сайд-скроллеров. Pip – величайший цифровой неудачник – всего лишь одинокий пиксель в 32-битном мире, который докажет вам, что героя не судят по одежке. В игре Pip может расти и развиваться, поглощая пиксели, оставшиеся от убитых врагов. Эти пиксели затем можно использовать для уничтожения преград и врагов, пока Pip снова не уменьшится до размеров одного пикселя. Игроков ожидает до 10 часов захватывающих приключений и пять стилизованных миров, где им предстоит спасти родную деревню Pip от злой королевы DeRezzia. Вдохновленные классическими приставочными играми, события Adventures of Pip происходят в мире, где игроки могут сразиться с огромным 32-битным боссом в обличье одинокого пикселя или даже 8-битного персонажа. Увеличивайте и уменьшайте Pip в размерах, чтобы решить головоломки и победить врагов; у каждой из трех доступных форм персонажа свои сильные и слабые стороны, которые вам еще предстоит изучить во время путешествия.

SE.name: Adventures of Pip™
SE.description: Adventures of Pip revitalizes the classic side-scrolling action platform genre. Pip -- the ultimate digital underdog – is a lowly single pixel in a 32-bit world who proves that you can’t judge a hero by the fidelity of his shaders. Pip -- the ultimate digital underdog – is a lowly single pixel in a 32-bit world who proves that you can’t judge a hero by the fidelity of his shaders. During the game, Pip gains the ability to evolve and grow by absorbing pixels from his fallen foes. Those same pixels can then be used to blast through environment puzzles and enemies, devolving Pip back to a single pixel. Players will explore five stylized worlds and experience up to 10 hours of epic adventure saving Pip’s village from the evil Queen DeRezzia. Inspired by classic platformers, Adventures of Pip basks in a world where players can defeat a huge 32-bit boss as a single pixel or even as an 8-bit character. With three different forms, evolve and devolve Pip to solve puzzles and defeat enemies; each with their own weakness and strength that must be unraveled throughout the campaign.
